short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced bookmark manager and tab organizer to enhance the native bookmarks and tabs
short.zh_CN: 高级书签管理, 标签页管理. 含书签栏, 标签, 纵向标签页栏, 标签页分组, 书签标签页转换, 标签页保存与恢复, 网页链接提取...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Main Features

- Cooperate with native bookmark system.
- Labels/Tags.
- Spread view & top bar.
- Advanced search.
- Recent bookmarks.
- Link replacing.

- Tab / session managements.
- Tabs as bookmarks.
- Side panel & vertical tab bar with tab groups.
- Workspaces.

- Data view. Copy bookmark or tab information to the clipboard.
- Data text editor. (edit bookmarks in your favorite text editor)
- Extract links from web page.
- Keyboard shortcuts.
- Link hint. (vi-like keyboard)
- Omnibox keyword for bookmarks.

- Export any bookmark folder.
- Import selected bookmarks from a file.
- Monthly backup.
- Auto sync for free.

##  Introduction

Abookmark is a professional bookmark viewer and manager. It has a manager page similar to the native bookmark manager and a navigation page similar to the native bookmark bar. And it is also a tab and session manager at the same time. 

What does a typical tab manager look like? They save tabs in one place, and then close tabs. These saved tabs can be divided into groups, which are called workspaces. You can reopen these tabs later, or open the entire group. They also provides simple data management functions, such as deleting, renaming, and moving between groups.

What is the essence of this saved data? It's just a list of web addresses. In fact they are bookmarks. The so-called workspace is in fact a bookmark folder, and the so-called tab manager is a simplified bookmark manager. So, why can't you just use the bookmark manager to manage tabs? This can have a number of benefits:

1. More flexible data structure. Bookmarked folders can be nested, you may call it sub-workspaces if you want.
2. More comprehensive data management functions.
3. More secure data storage.
4. Automatic data synchronization. Browsers usually come with a synchronization feature for bookmark data, which can even be used on mobile phones.
5. Cooperation between tabs and bookmarks.

Of course, some of the details of tab management are unique, which requires the bookmark manager to add corresponding support. In fact, some users already use the native bookmark management system to manage tabs manually, and there are also tab management plugins that are dedicated to saving tabs as bookmarks.  Abookmark goes one step further by abstracting bookmarks and tabs into nodes. Bookmarks are sleeping tabs, while tabs are active bookmarks.

Tabs can also be manipulated through the tab nodes, and tab groups are mapped to folders. Using tab nodes on the side panel is similar to the vertical tab bar of Edge, but with the ability to communicate with bookmarks.

Abookmark offers a high degree of freedom, which is a double-edged sword. In addition, Abookmark also offers some advanced features. New users should familiarize themselves with the basic logic before gradually exploring more powerful features.

https://www.abookmark.org

## Privacy

All your bookmarks are stored in your browser system. Abookmark does not transfer them to anywhere else.
long.zh_CN:
Abookmark 是一款专业书签管理及标签页管理插件, 与 chrome/edge 原生书签系统完全兼容, 并在其基础上增加了一些功能:

- 标签页管理. 您可以把当前打开的所有或部分网址保存起来, 在需要的时候重新打开. 数据保存为浏览器原生书签, 可以在多浏览器间同步. 
- 侧边栏与纵向标签页栏, 支持标签页分组.
- 数据视图. 复制书签或标签页信息到剪贴板.
- 标签.
- 链接采集模式. 开启后, 您在当前网页上 ctrl+点击的链接(也即在新标签页中打开的链接)会直接保存为书签.
- 工作空间. 可方便更新与增删书签.
- 更新到当前网址 - 手动版航行模式.
- 导出指定文件夹下的书签.
- 临时加载/预览导出的书签.
- 定时备份书签.
- 搜索最近添加的书签.
- 多列单屏展示.
- 网页链接提取.
- 文本编辑器.
- 书签/标签页信息复制到剪贴板.
- 书签栏与导航页. 书签栏相当于 chrome 的书签栏 + 多列单屏展示, 尤其适合书签较多的用户. 
- 地址栏书签关键字

## 简介

Abookmark 首先是专业的书签浏览器与书签管理器. 它有与系统原生的书签管理器及书签栏对应的功能, 但又有所拓展, 可以管理大量数据. 同时, 它还是一款标签页管理器. 

一般的标签页管理器是什么样的呢? 它们把标签页保存在一个地方, 然后关闭标签页. 这些保存的标签页可以分为若干组, 这叫做工作区. 需要的时候可以重新打开这些标签页, 或者打开整个分组. 管理器还提供简单的数据管理功能, 比如删除, 改名, 在组间移动. 这些保存的数据本质上是什么呢? 不过是一条条的网页地址, 也即书签. 从数据的角度来说, 保存标签页和保存书签并没有区别, 只是人们给其起了不同的名字. 工作区不过是书签文件夹, 标签页管理器不过是简化了的书签管理器. 那么, 为什么不可以直接用书签管理器来管理标签页呢? 这可以带来不少好处:

1, 更灵活的数据结构. 书签的文件夹可以嵌套, 这意味着可以轻松实现子工作区.
2, 更全面的数据管理功能. 书签管理器的管理功能是专业的.
3, 更有保障的数据存储.
4, 数据自动同步. 浏览器通常自带书签数据的同步功能, 这些数据甚至可以在手机上使用.
5, 标签页与书签间的自由转换.

当然, 标签页管理的一些细节上是有其独特性的, 这需要书签管理器增加相应支持. 但是, 这并不是本质性问题. 事实上一些用户已经用原生的书签管理系统来手动管理标签页了, 也存在一些致力于将标签页保存为书签的标签页管理插件.  Abookmark 则是更进一步, 把书签与标签页都抽象为节点. 书签是沉睡的标签页, 而标签页是激活了的书签.

也可以通过侧边栏中的标签页节点来操作标签页, 此时标签页组映射为文件夹. 使用上这类似于 edge 的垂直标签页栏, 同时可以享受与书签相通的功能.

Abookmark 提供了较高的自由度, 这是把双刃剑. 此外, Abookmark 还提供了一些高级特性. 新用户应该先熟悉基本逻辑, 然后再逐渐探索更强大的功能.

https://www.abookmark.org

## Privacy

所有数据均保存于本地. Abookmark 不会向别处传输任何用户数据.
